home.title: What will you accomplish today?
home.subtitle: Describe a task and let AI handle the rest
home.placeholder: Describe a task and let AI handle the rest

calendarPrep.title: Calendar Prep Notes
calendarPrep.description: Review tomorrow's meetings and draft a prep notes doc
calendarPrep.prompt: Check my Google Calendar for tomorrow's meetings and draft preparation notes in a new Google Doc.

inboxCleanup.title: Inbox Promo Cleanup
inboxCleanup.description: Clear promotional emails from the last 24 hours
inboxCleanup.prompt: Go to my Gmail inbox and delete all promotional emails from the last 24 hours.

competitorPricing.title: Competitor Pricing Deck
competitorPricing.description: Analyze competitor pricing and draft a slide with recommendations
competitorPricing.prompt: Pull pricing and features from these 5 competitor sites [list URLs], save to a CSV, analyze our pricing gaps, and draft a recommendation slide in Google Slides for Monday's meeting.

notionAudit.title: Notion API Audit
notionAudit.description: Scan a Notion wiki for old API mentions with direct links
notionAudit.prompt: Read through this Notion wiki at [URL] and find all mentions of the old API, listing them with page links.

stagingVsProd.title: Staging vs Prod Visual Check
stagingVsProd.description: Compare staging and production visuals with screenshots
stagingVsProd.prompt: Compare my staging site at [URL] to production at [URL] and screenshot any visual differences.

brokenLinks.title: Production Broken Links
brokenLinks.description: Check my website for broken links
brokenLinks.prompt: Open [URL], click through every link, and report any 404 errors.

portfolioMonitoring.title: Portfolio Monitoring
portfolioMonitoring.description: Watch stock prices, and alert on drops and spikes
portfolioMonitoring.prompt: Monitor my stock portfolio on [broker site], alert on price drops and spikes.

jobApplication.title: Job Application Automation
jobApplication.description: Filter jobs and submit applications with saved profiles
jobApplication.prompt: Find job listings from Indeed for [query], sort by salary, and apply to the top 5 using my profile.

eventCalendar.title: Event Calendar Builder
eventCalendar.description: Select top events and add them to the calendar
eventCalendar.prompt: Scrape event listings from Eventbrite, filter by location, and add top 5 to my calendar.

taskInput.placeholder: Assign a task or ask anything

cloud.description: Select a cloud AI model. Requires an API key for the provider.
cloud.noApiKeyWarning: No API key configured for {{provider}}. Add one below.

local.description: Connect to a local Ollama server to use models running on your machine.
local.helpText: Make sure Ollama is installed and running, then click Test to connect.

proxy.description: Connect through proxy platforms to access multiple AI providers with a single API key.

openrouter.title: OpenRouter
openrouter.subtitle: 200+ models
openrouter.description: Enter your OpenRouter API key to access 200+ models from multiple providers.

litellm.title: LiteLLM
litellm.subtitle: Self-hosted proxy
litellm.description: Connect to your LiteLLM proxy to access multiple providers through a unified interface.

apiKey.title: Bring Your Own Model/API Key
apiKey.description: Setup the API key and model for your own AI coworker.

developer.title: Developer
developer.debugDescription: Show detailed backend logs including Claude CLI commands, flags, and stdout/stderr output in the task view.
developer.debugEnabled: Debug mode is enabled. Backend logs will appear in the task view when running tasks.

about.title: About
about.description: Openwork is a local computer-use AI agent for your Mac that reads your files, creates documents, and automates repetitive knowledge work—all open-source with your AI models of choice.
about.feedback: Any questions or feedback? Click here to contact us.
